decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings: A102: EXISTING FRONT AND REAR ELEVATION; A103: EXISTING SIDE ELEVATION 1; A104: EXISTING SIDE ELEVATION 2; A105: EXISTING SECTION 1; A100: EXISTING GROUND FLOOR PLAN; A101: EXISTING 1ST FLOOR PLAN; A108: PROPOSED REAR ELEVATION; A109: PROPOSED SIDE ELEVATION 2; A110: PROPOSED SIDE ELEVATION 1; A111: PROPOSED SECTION 1; A112: PROPOSED SECTION 2; A113: PROPOSED 3D 1; A114: PROPOSED 3D 2; A115: PROPOSED 3D 3; A116: PROPOSED 3D 4; A106: PROPOSED GROUND FLOOR PLAN; A107: PROPOSED 1ST FLOOR PLAN; A117: SLP & BP
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.

| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings listed under condition 2.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021). | No part of the roof of the extension shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof garden, roof terrace or similar amenity area.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of nearby properties in accordance with policies D4 and D6 of The London Plan (2021), polices 7.4, 7A & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013) and polices 1.1 (e)(g), 1.2 (f), 2.1(c) and 2.10 Core Strategy (2012).
description: Single storey side return (side and rear) extension.
